title: LG 27MP400-B 27 Inch Monitor Full HD (1920 x 1080) IPS Display with 3-Side Virtually Borderless Design, AMD FreeSync and OnScreen Control – Black
article_markdown:
# Introduction

The LG 27MP400-B 27 Inch Monitor is a versatile and high-quality display designed for a variety of uses, from gaming to professional work. With its Full HD resolution and IPS technology, this monitor promises vibrant colors and wide viewing angles, making it an excellent choice for anyone looking to enhance their visual experience. Its sleek, virtually borderless design not only adds a modern touch to any workspace but also maximizes screen real estate, making it ideal for multitasking. 

## Stunning Visuals and Smooth Performance

One of the standout features of the LG 27MP400-B is its Full HD (1920 x 1080) IPS display, which delivers exceptional color accuracy and clarity. Whether you're watching movies, playing games, or working on graphic design projects, the monitor's vibrant visuals will impress. The 75Hz refresh rate ensures smooth motion, reducing blurriness during fast-paced scenes, which is particularly beneficial for gamers looking for a competitive edge. Additionally, the built-in AMD FreeSync technology minimizes screen tearing and stuttering, providing a seamless gaming experience.

## Thoughtful Design for Everyday Use

The monitor's 3-side virtually borderless design enhances the viewing experience by allowing users to focus on the content without distractions. This feature is especially useful for those who use multiple monitors, as it creates a more immersive setup. The uni-body design not only looks sleek but also includes tilt adjustment, allowing users to find the perfect viewing angle. For those with limited desk space, the LG 27MP400-B is wall mountable, providing flexibility in how you set up your workspace.

## User-Friendly Features

The LG 27MP400-B is equipped with OnScreen Control, which simplifies the customization of your workspace. Users can easily split the display or adjust monitor settings with just a few clicks, making it convenient to tailor the monitor to their specific needs. Additionally, the Reader Mode feature reduces blue light emissions, making it easier on the eyes during long reading sessions, which is a great benefit for students and professionals alike.

## Customer Experiences

Customer reviews highlight the monitor's impressive performance and value for money. Many users appreciate the large viewing area and the clarity of the display, noting that it works well as a secondary monitor or even as a primary screen for various tasks. One user mentioned using it for an arcade build, praising its good picture quality and narrow bezel. While some reviews pointed out the lack of additional HDMI ports and built-in speakers, most users found these limitations manageable given the monitor's price point.

Several customers emphasized the monitor's suitability for schoolwork and general use, with one user stating it was "beyond perfect" for their needs. The adjustable brightness settings were also noted as a positive feature, allowing for a comfortable viewing experience in different lighting conditions. Overall, the feedback indicates that the LG 27MP400-B is a reliable choice for those seeking a quality monitor without breaking the bank.

# Conclusion

In summary, the LG 27MP400-B 27 Inch Monitor offers a compelling combination of features, performance, and design that caters to a wide range of users. Its Full HD IPS display, smooth refresh rate, and user-friendly features make it an excellent choice for gaming, work, and entertainment. While it may lack some advanced features found in higher-end models, its affordability and quality make it a standout option for anyone in need of a dependable monitor. Whether you're a student, a gamer, or a professional, the LG 27MP400-B is sure to enhance your visual experience and productivity.
